All patient diagnose definite probable PM DM accord Bohan Peter criterion ( Bohan Peter 1975 ) 2003-2010 , Rheumatology clinic Karolinska University Hospital , also include Swedish Rheumatology Register ( SweMyoNet ) perform measure dynamic muscle endurance FI-2 isometric muscle strength MMT-8 include register study ( n=71 ) . Functional Index-2 disease specific , valid reliable instrument assess muscular endurance seven muscle group include seven task ; shoulder flexion , shoulder abduction , neck flexion , hip flexion , step test toe lift heel lift . Each muscle group score number correctly execute repetition . The six-item core set measure disease activity include ; Physician 's patient 's assessment disease activity Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) , Manual Muscle Test ( MMT ) , Stanford Health Assessment Questionnaire ( HAQ ) , analyse muscle enzymes extra-muscular disease activity score Myositis Disease Activity Visual Analogue Scales ( MYOACT ) Myositis Intention Treat Index ( MITAX ) . The 8-muscle group MMT perform dominant body side include muscle group ; neck flexor , deltoid , biceps brachia , dorsi flexor wrist , gluteus maximus medius , quadriceps dorsi flexor ankle .
